msbt.message: Today's the day, kiddo. The big Bug-Off.I'm somethin' of a bug whisperer, y'see? I say, "C'MERE, YOU!" and they practically jump into my net!

If you can only remember one thing about the Bug-Off, remember this: "Sneaky feetles catch the beetles!" That means don't go stompin' around if you hope to make the podium. The bugs'll get scared off!
Nothin' against bugs, but when one of 'em surprises me on a walk, I just flip out! It's not good for my constitution! I can tell you that, .
I can't enter you in the Bug-Off. You know that, right?I'm happy to stand around yakkin', but if you wanna compete, you're gonna have to move on.
Seems like all the kids are into catchin' bugs these daysOh yeah! Because of the Bug-Off. ,
